message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 3-7-2, translated into en
data:
Birth rate in adolescents aged 10 to 14 years and 15 to 19 years (birth rate in adolescents per 1,000 women)

The birth rate of adolescents represents the risk of becoming pregnant among women of a certain age group. The adolescent birth rate (ABR) is also & # xE9; m & # xE9; called specific fertility rate is (ASFR) for ages 15 to 19, a designation commonly used in the context of the calculation of total fertility estimates. A related measure & # xE9; the proposal of adolescent fertility, measured as the percentage of total fertility contributed by women aged 15 to 19
